Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Bowl
Description: Wide-mouthed bowl with straight rounded rim and truncate cone-shaped body with marked curvature in the upper third. Stable base with almost flat bottom. Paste of a dark dun colour and both interior and exterior surface covered with a reddish coating, partially lost. In the interior we find a painted decoration of geometrical design: dots of a dark red colour forming transversal lines which cross each other in the middle.
